alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:19AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Union, northeastern Ouachita and northeastern Lincoln Parishes through 400 AM CDT... At 319 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Farmerville, or 19 miles southeast of Junction City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Swartz, Farmerville, Sterlington, Marion, Fairbanks, D Arbonne, Perryville, Loch Lomon, Spencer, Haile, Linville, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Rocky Branch, Guthrie, Deshard and Shiloh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for north central Louisiana.
